verses.verse: Nevertheless the <S%H4155>dimness<s%> shall not be such as was in her <S%H4164>vexation<s%>, <S%H6256>when<s%> at the <S%H7223>first<s%> he lightly <S%H7043>afflicted<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H2074>Zebulun<s%> and the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H5321>Naphtali<s%>, and <S%H314>afterward<s%> did more grievously <S%H3513>afflict<s%> her by the <S%H1870>way<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea<s%>, <S%H5676>beyond<s%> <S%H3383>Jordan<s%>, in <S%H1551>Galilee<s%> of the <S%H1471>nations<s%>.

The <S%H5971>people<s%> that <S%H1980>walked<s%> in <S%H2822>darkness<s%> have <S%H7200>seen<s%> a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H216>light<s%>: they that <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of the shadow of <S%H6757>death<s%>, upon them hath the <S%H216>light<s%> <S%H5050>shined<s%>.

Thou hast <S%H7235>multiplied<s%> the <S%H1471>nation<s%>, and not <S%H1431>increased<s%> the <S%H8057>joy<s%>: they <S%H8055>joy<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> thee according to the <S%H8057>joy<s%> in <S%H7105>harvest<s%>, and as men <S%H1523>rejoice<s%> when they <S%H2505>divide<s%> the <S%H7998>spoil<s%>.

For thou hast <S%H2865>broken<s%> the <S%H5923>yoke<s%> of his <S%H5448>burden<s%>, and the <S%H4294>staff<s%> of his <S%H7926>shoulder<s%>, the <S%H7626>rod<s%> of his <S%H5065>oppressor<s%>, as in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H4080>Midian<s%>.

For every <S%H5430>battle<s%> of the <S%H5431>warrior<s%> is with confused <S%H7494>noise<s%>, and <S%H8071>garments<s%> <S%H1556>rolled<s%> in <S%H1818>blood<s%>; but this shall be with <S%H8316>burning<s%> and <S%H3980>fuel<s%> of <S%H784>fire<s%>.

For unto us a <S%H3206>child<s%> is <S%H3205>born<s%>, unto us a <S%H1121>son<s%> is <S%H5414>given<s%>: and the <S%H4951>government<s%> shall be upon his <S%H7926>shoulder<s%>: and his <S%H8034>name<s%> shall be <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H6382>Wonderful<s%>, <S%H3289>Counseller<s%>, The <S%H1368>mighty<s%> <S%H410>God<s%>, The <S%H5703>everlasting<s%> <S%H1>Father<s%>, The <S%H8269>Prince<s%> of <S%H7965>Peace<s%>.

Of the <S%H4766>increase<s%> of his <S%H4951>government<s%> and <S%H7965>peace<s%> there shall be no <S%H7093>end<s%>, upon the <S%H3678>throne<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%>, and upon his <S%H4467>kingdom<s%>, to <S%H3559>order<s%> it, and to <S%H5582>establish<s%> it with <S%H4941>judgment<s%> and with <S%H6666>justice<s%> from henceforth even <S%H5704>for<s%> <S%H5769>ever<s%>. The <S%H7068>zeal<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%> will <S%H6213>perform<s%> this.
¶ The <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> a <S%H1697>word<s%> into <S%H3290>Jacob<s%>, and it hath <S%H5307>lighted<s%> upon <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.

And all the <S%H5971>people<s%> shall <S%H3045>know<s%>, even <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> and the <S%H3427>inhabitant<s%> of <S%H8111>Samaria<s%>, that <S%H559>say<s%> in the <S%H1346>pride<s%> and <S%H1433>stoutness<s%> of <S%H3824>heart<s%>,

The <S%H3843>bricks<s%> are fallen <S%H5307>down<s%>, but we will <S%H1129>build<s%> with hewn <S%H1496>stones<s%>: the <S%H8256>sycomores<s%> are cut <S%H1438>down<s%>, but we will <S%H2498>change<s%> them into <S%H730>cedars<s%>.
Therefore the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall set <S%H7682>up<s%> the <S%H6862>adversaries<s%> of <S%H7526>Rezin<s%> against him, and <S%H5526>join<s%> his <S%H341>enemies<s%> <S%H5526>together<s%>;

The <S%H758>Syrians<s%> <S%H6924>before<s%>, and the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> <S%H268>behind<s%>; and they shall <S%H398>devour<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> with open <S%H6310>mouth<s%>. For all this his <S%H639>anger<s%> is not turned <S%H7725>away<s%>, but his <S%H3027>hand<s%> is stretched out <S%H5186>still<s%>.
¶ For the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H7725>turneth<s%> not unto him that <S%H5221>smiteth<s%> them, neither do they <S%H1875>seek<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>.

Therefore the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> will cut <S%H3772>off<s%> from <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H7218>head<s%> and <S%H2180>tail<s%>, <S%H3712>branch<s%> and <S%H100>rush<s%>, in <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%>.

The <S%H2205>ancient<s%> and <S%H6440%H5375>honourable<s%>, <S%H1931>he<s%> is the <S%H7218>head<s%>; and the <S%H5030>prophet<s%> that <S%H3384>teacheth<s%> <S%H8267>lies<s%>, he is the <S%H2180>tail<s%>.
For the <S%H833>leaders<s%> of this <S%H5971>people<s%> cause them to <S%H8582>err<s%>; and they that are <S%H833>led<s%> of them are <S%H1104>destroyed<s%>.

Therefore the <S%H136>Lord<s%> shall have no <S%H8055>joy<s%> in their young <S%H970>men<s%>, neither shall have <S%H7355>mercy<s%> on their <S%H3490>fatherless<s%> and <S%H490>widows<s%>: for every one is an <S%H2611>hypocrite<s%> and an <S%H7489>evildoer<s%>, and every <S%H6310>mouth<s%> <S%H1696>speaketh<s%> <S%H5039>folly<s%>. For all this his <S%H639>anger<s%> is not turned <S%H7725>away<s%>, but his <S%H3027>hand<s%> is stretched out <S%H5186>still<s%>.

¶ For <S%H7564>wickedness<s%> <S%H1197>burneth<s%> as the <S%H784>fire<s%>: it shall <S%H398>devour<s%> the <S%H8068>briers<s%> and <S%H7898>thorns<s%>, and shall <S%H3341>kindle<s%> in the <S%H5442>thickets<s%> of the <S%H3293>forest<s%>, and they shall mount <S%H55>up<s%> like the lifting <S%H1348>up<s%> of <S%H6227>smoke<s%>.

Through the <S%H5678>wrath<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%> is the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H6272>darkened<s%>, and the <S%H5971>people<s%> shall be as the <S%H3980>fuel<s%> of the <S%H784>fire<s%>: no <S%H376>man<s%> shall <S%H2550>spare<s%> his <S%H251>brother<s%>.

And he shall <S%H1504>snatch<s%> on the right <S%H3225>hand<s%>, and be <S%H7457>hungry<s%>; and he shall <S%H398>eat<s%> on the left <S%H8040>hand<s%>, and they shall not be <S%H7646>satisfied<s%>: they shall <S%H398>eat<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> the <S%H1320>flesh<s%> of his own <S%H2220>arm<s%>:

<S%H4519>Manasseh<s%>, <S%H669>Ephraim<s%>; and <S%H669>Ephraim<s%>, <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%>: and they <S%H3162>together<s%> shall be against <S%H3063>Judah<s%>. For all this his <S%H639>anger<s%> is not turned <S%H7725>away<s%>, but his <S%H3027>hand<s%> is stretched out <S%H5186>still<s%>.
